item.title: Stremio is Now Available on Fire OS Store!
item.description: After removing the “Stremio” scam app from Amazon Store recently due to trademark infringement, you can now find the official Stremio app on FireOS devices in the Amazon App Store! Stremio no longer needs to be sideloaded on any FireOS device anymore and it includes automated updates. Stay tuned as we may still have more…
